com.jidesoft.chart.fit
Class LineFitter

java.lang.Object
  com.jidesoft.chart.fit.LineFitter
All Implemented Interfaces:
CurveFitter
public class LineFitter
extends Object
implements CurveFitter

Uses Ordinary Least Squares regression to fit a line to a dataset

Author:
Ian Fairman (ifairman@catalysoft.com), Simon White (swhite@catalysoft.com)
See Also:
Wikipedia on Simple Linear Regression
